data.text: @KCMOHealthDept @HealthyLivingMo It was a contractor for @HealthyLivingMo, not KCHD! We reached out to the # they gave us and no luck.

@abbyrosehoover @HealthyLivingMo That is frustrating. For our testing sites, we usually remind people to check their junk folders where unrecognized email addresses may land. You probably tried that, but we're just putting it here as a reminder to others.

@abbyrosehoover @HealthyLivingMo @KCMOHealthDept That must have been so frustrating! Results are important for tracing &  health, but also for job security. With varying severity of infection and long covid, some employers ask for (+) results in order to allow staying home and taking care w/out getting fired for missing work!
@KCMOHealthDept @HealthyLivingMo That’s crazy, I appreciate you all! I just can’t believe we never heard back from the testing site.

@abbyrosehoover @HealthyLivingMo Thank you for staying in! We don't know why his test result never came. In the week he tested positive, so did at least 6.7 thousand other KC residents.(This does not even include home testing kits or rapids.) Once we receive cases from MO, we contact trace or send these letters.
We stayed home because we felt sick - how many people never got their results and didn’t?!
